title: How to get my Bookmark column back on the left side of the screen
content: I recently refreshed my Firefox browser page and now the left-hand column that had all my Bookmarks listed has disappeared. How do I get it back? I can't find anything in Settings that says Show Bookmarks like it used to.
creator: delliott2

title: Find System
content: Когда использую клавитару вне полей для ввода данных, он сразу начинает включать поиск по странице. Как это убрать? Я хочу включать поиск только когда я нажимаю Ctrl+F, а не всегда!
creator: duke_nukem-karl

title: Secure Connection not available for an HTTPS:// invoked URL.
content:
When I click on a button in an email to go to this web site https://r.smartbrief.com/resp/oatyCjrLcVDqaDpYCifCyZCicNrdhZ?format=multipart the shield is marked with a red slash and the error screen comes up with


HTTPS-Only Mode Alert Secure Connection Not Available

You’ve enabled HTTPS-Only Mode for enhanced security, and a HTTPS version of r.smartbrief.com is not available.

This link has worked thousands of time in the past with Secure Connection Mode turned on.

Why is it FAILING now?????????

When I click on the Continue to HTTP Site button, the HTTPS:// link is fully invoked.

Something is wrong with Firefox 89.0.2 running on MacOS 10.14.6 on a MacBook 2017 model.
creator: worldman

title: The bookmarks "saved to library" animation where it would show a star going into the books, is not appearing after the latest update
content: The bookmarks "saved to library" animation where it would show a star going into the books, is not appearing after the latest update. Is there a way to turn it back on, or something? Please help this is seriously impacting my user experience, as I rely on that animation to test if certain things work on my computer, as my computer is slow.(not going to elaborate on the last part)
creator: finndotcom

title: starting fire fox
content: When starting up Fire Fox to go online ATT sends Server Not Found
creator: dont629

title: Where Is Firefox Ad Blocker Control?
content:
Trying to submit a review on Hunterfan.com using Firefox is not possible. Despite turning off such "Privacy and Security" settings as "Permissions->Block pop-up windows" I still get the warning "Disable Ad-blocker to submit a review" and can never submit the review.

This has also happened on other web sites where I was submitting a feedback, or support request form and has necessitated using another browser to do so.

QUESTION: what security setting do I need to change when trying to submit input to such sites?
creator: wmcole

title: trying to add secondary email account so I can change my primary email, but it won't let me
content: When I try to add a secondary email address to my account, it says "Secondary email must be different than you account email" for all addresses I put in. I am not putting in my primary email address! Why won't it accept another email address?
creator: Stroudja
